products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Steel Roller Blind
products.description: Make a contemporary impact on your home decor with the boheme steel double sided blackout roller blind. The simple yet bold effect of this leaf print motif is depicted on both sides of this tough, pvc roller blind, reflecting your funky interior style outside. This two-tone pattern of white and steel grey is so versatile and can be effectively teamed with a range of colours to create your desired look.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: When you want something decidedly neutral and contemporary, this handsome design will work perfectly. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle dcor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice. A high-quality finish that is flame retardant; boheme pvc blackout stone grey roller blind is crafted out of a special blackout fabric so light won't travel into your room when closed.

products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Graphite Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A true mid grey shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing. products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Marina Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Smart and timeless, isla pvc blackout marina grey roller blind gives you an air of refined sophistication wherever you choose to feature it. With a double-sided pattern consisting of gently curving leaves in a variety of different sizes, it provides a subtle focal point in your room of choice. The isla marina uses a special blackout material, ideal for shutting out the daylight when you need to and its flame retardant for extra safety.

products.title: Amor Washed Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

products.title: Amor Dolphin Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Add a darker grey tone to your room with the amor dolphin grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Amor Soft Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The light grey amor soft grey is a blind that suits a more natural looking room. Shades of stone and creams work well with this fabric but also as a contrast to darker tones of blue, brown and purple. This fabric is inoffensive and would suit any number of rooms. The amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Amor Shark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The deeper grey colour of the amor shark grey is one that will certainly make a statement in any room. Whether going in a bedroom, living room or bathroom this blind will fit in anywhere. This blind works especially well in modern interiors in place of black. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Deanna, Cool Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The cool grey deanna is best described as a natural stone grey that yields an appealing and calming finish. The colour is beautifully complemented by the distinctive free-flowing nature of the deanna patterning. Cool grey works well in a wide range of colour schemes. Place in a monochrome bathroom amongst white enamel and light-toned tiling, or with deep reds or burnt oranges for a modern living or dining room.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Soothing and luxurious, the cool grey splash (blackout) code adds a sense of tranquillity to any room. This shimmering blind is easy to clean making it a practical choice as well as a stylish one, not to mention the easy-rolling mechanism that it hangs from. Create a feeling of sanctuary in your bathroom by pairing with an all-white or pale grey scheme, and accessorising with pops of colour. The code will match most shades, with turquoise and green being popular options.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in light grey is soft in colour but hardy in quality, and despite its pale hue, has excellent blackout properties, blocking out any kind of light you need it to. Tame bold reds, bright blues, or neon greens or complement slate greys, ebony blacks, and stark whites; the choice is yours. This is the perfect blind for a monochrome bathroom for a contemporary or industrial look.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: Combat those long nights of disturbed sleep by opting for the origin (blackout) in taupe, a quality blackout blind with modern style and opulent colour. This blind will shields against both night-time light and summer-time sun, making it a practical choice as well as a pleasing one. Compliment the taupe with a mild and elegant dcor scheme featuring ivory, biscuit, and caramel hues. Include plenty of compelling textures and sumptuous cloths to create a comforting realm, adding golden embellishments and gilded accessories for a modern, metallic edge to a traditional scheme.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Roller Blind
products.description: The slate shade of the origin (blackout) in graphite is about as contemporary a colour as you can get, and its high quality blackout properties make it practical as well as stylish, as do its durable yet lightweight fabric and easy-to-use rolling mechanism. Use amongst bold reds or cool blues in your home office, or give a rustic living room or dining room a modern twist. This blind will look particularly good when paired with light to medium woods and off-white walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin in charcoal is a blackout fabric with a difference that's been specially made for those of you who love the contemporary look of this on-trend shade of grey. Deep, earthy, and by far the best way to put your mind at ease at the end of long day. Matching with light woody browns would be an inspired way to continue the natural colour scheme around the room with the click of a button. It's all about feeling peaceful and free, so add in a few throws on the couches and a beanbag in the corner.

products.title: Affinity, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity in silver combines the distinctive affinity patterning with a barely-there silver fabric to provide a truly stunning interaction between room light and blind, making an ethereal addition to any home. This pretty fabric keeps out enough of the outside world to offer privacy, yet won't totally blackout a room. Couple the affinity silver with a dark navy for a moody yet beautiful bedroom colour scheme, or add a hint of sophistication to a monochrome dining room.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Splash (blackout) grey combines an intricate texture with a swirling and free-flowing pattern to create a design that is sure to catch the eye. The combination of two different neutral stone shades says everything you need to know about this unique approach to design. It's one that's sure to spark your creativity into life. As you recreate your space you want to give some thought to how you'll manage the light as it enters your room.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Slate - Roller Blind
products.description: The functional form of the sarra (blackout) blind in slate is practical yet stylish, offering full protection against uv rays, while also giving a room a cool, almost industrial vibe. The fabric is of the highest quality, with an easy-to-use rolling mechanism to match. The traditional use for grey might be to pair it with blacks and whites for a monochrome look, but how about keeping in with the latest trends and using with yellow and white in the kitchen? Or teaming up with hot pinks in the bathroom or bold oranges in the hall? The possibilities are endless.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection is both an attractive and practical range of quality blinds, with flame-retardant fabric and a modern roller mechanism. Feature the pewter in either a domestic or commercial surrounding for a contemporary look with beneficial practical properties. Combine the pewter with a modern and distinctive monochrome scheme to form a contemporary look full of current and characteristic style.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the cool and contemporary roma (fr) in grey within any surrounding for a modern looking blind with graceful finesse. This lenient and flame-retardant cloth forms an easy-to-use roller-blind with a simple pull-cord mechanism and in a charming, dove grey finish. Combine the grey with a distinctive and compelling palette of white, charcoal, and black shades to form a monochrome-influenced scheme that's full of alluring colour contrasts.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection features flame-retardant fabrics, which makes them perfect for either the family home or commercial site. The light grey edition is sure to blend within any dcor style for a contemporary look with subtle shade. Form an attractive and delicate palette, with an industrial edge, by incorporating the light grey with a soft blend of pastels in vintage pinks and creams. Accent the blind by adding subdued grey fabrics within the rest of the room, adding character and charm with dainty florals and paisley prints.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: The light, pastel shade of the origin (blackout) in steel adds a perfectly neutral accent to any window. Its cutting edge blackout properties mean that it will keep out even the brightest rays from the sun, yet you won't be compromising on style. The steel contrasts wonderfully with its sister browns and beiges, yet also tempers bolder colours such as burgundy or emerald when needed. Use to complement contemporary patterns in the kitchen or bold blues or greens in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to add a subtle stone grey to the mix that has a hint of urban chic, origin stone is the fabric that makes it possible. It's more than just a unique touch of style, and thanks to the blackout fabric it allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. The perfect marriage of style and functionality. Taking your time is the way to create spaces you love, so why not give your new project some extra thought? Lightly sanded floors, magnolia walls, and striking wall art to finish everything off.

products.title: Kerry Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: The dark grey of the kerry charcoal is perfect for adding as darker and mysterious tone to your windows, or pairing in with a darker grey feature wall in your home. This is a blackout fabric so will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Use this in your bedroom if you're woken by the early morning sun or bright streetlamps outside your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Dark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The kerry dark grey is probably the colour that would come to mind when someone says the words 'dark grey' to you. With this in mind, we do offer free samples of all their fabrics, but equally, if you're looking for a dark grey blind - this is probably it. Being blackout means this is perfect for your bedroom too as it will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Stoney Rock Roller Blind
products.description: The lighter grey colour of the kerry stoney rock is perfect for adding into a more neutral and toned down decor. This blind is great for pairing against lighter grey decors and for blending into the background. This blind is also perfect for bedrooms as the blackout fabric will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Midnight Silver Roller Blind
products.description: Cool as a cucumber, this sharp grey blackout blind is a fantastic way to add an edge to your interior styling. Throw it in with dark blues or rich reds and you will have a beautiful contrast that is not too jarring to the beholder. Alternatively, use it in a monochromatic scheme to bridge the contrast and make the room seem sleeker and more uniform. With a fully blackout lining, you wont even need to worry about the sun shining in and and being a jerk by waking you up.

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Roller Blind
products.description: The pale purple gibson lilac mist is ideal for lighter rooms, or for pairing with light purple or blue furniture. Match this in with your bathroom towels to create a coherent colour in the bathroom. Being 100% waterproof makes this blind perfect for installing in your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The light gibson powder grey is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this in any room in your home as it is fire retardant and 100% moisture resistant - ideal for bathrooms. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Pewter Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson pewter is a dark grey coloured roller blind, pair this against lighter decors to make a statement in the room. The dark colour pairs well with darker decors too, but throw something light in there to keep the mood up. This blind looks brilliant in a bathroom, and being 100% waterproof makes it the perfect addition to your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.
